programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: The Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2024 promises to be an adrenaline-packed showcase of the world’s top freeride skiers and snowboarders, set against the stunning backdrop of Nendaz’s pristine alpine terrain.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #01: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports 2025 and to the thrilling finale of the BrinxWorld Downhill Skateboarding Championship2024 from the breathtaking slopes of Roan Mountain, USA, where speed meets skill and gravity takes no prisoners.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #02: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: Today we look back at the 2024 Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup – a season of breathtaking tricks, fierce competition, and unforgettable moments. Join us as we relive the highlights, celebrate the champions, and wrap up an incredible year on the water!

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: VANORA Engadinwind by DAKINE - Racing
programme.desc: For almost two weeks, Lake Silvaplana in the beautiful Engadine will be the meeting point for the international windsurfing elite. With more than 300 participants from over 30 countries worldwide, the Engandinwind is the largest windsurf foil event of all time.

programme.title: E-Bike Festival Verbier 2020
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival is taking place in Val de Bagnes for the second time this summer! 4 days dedicated to e-biking! With 5 different activities on offer: E-Bike Test, Rando Gourmande, Discovery Trails, E-Tour du Val de Bagnes or Bosch E-MTB Challenge.

programme.title: Less
programme.desc: Der 15. jährliche Ski-Film von Level 1. Mit dabei: Magnus Granér. LSM. Will Berman. Duncan Adams. Sig Tveit. Adam Delorme. Tim McChesney. Wiley Miller. Khai Krepela. Will Wesson. Sandy Boville. Shay Lee. Tanner Rainville. LJ Strenio. Banks Gilberti. Logan Imlach.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #03
programme.desc: Die Stomp Show-Events = Park Jam und Big Air - das sind innovative, stilbezogene Wettbewerbe, bei denen die Athleten ihr Talent und ihr Können unter Beweis stellen können.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup Brazil 2022
programme.desc: Nach den beeindruckenden Freestyle-Finals, die Anfang des Monats in der Taiba-Lagune ausgetragen wurden, sind nun die Kite-Surfer an der Reihe, ihre Weltmeister beim letzten Event der Saison zu ermitteln.

programme.title: NEOM Titan Desert Dash Saudi Arabia - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien ist viel mehr als ein MTB-Rennen. Es ist ein viertägiges Abenteuer mit ständigen sportlichen Herausforderungen.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #03: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow
programme.desc: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow / Europe: A look back at the skate highlights of the 2023 World Rookie Tour. Then we show the best of the 2024 ski and snowboard action. And finally, we let it rip once again - with the 2024 Skate Finals!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #05: 10 Years LAAX OPEN Documentary
programme.desc: The Laax Open has been a meeting place for winter sports fans for years. See the best riders, breathtaking performances and unforgettable moments that have shaped the history of freestyle culture.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #06: Queen & King of the Court Finals 2024
programme.desc: The stage is set for the 2024 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series Finals in Qatar! The best beach volleyball players will compete against each other in the Aspire Zone. From December 12-14, the best athletes in the world will battle it out for the title.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2016 - The Heroes
programme.desc: Every year since 2008, the world's best freeride skiers and snowboarders have competed for the world championship title in the Freeride World Tour. Thanks to the top sporting performances, the tour has become an integral part of the international winter sports calendar.

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Iceland Traverse - Mountain Bike Expedition - Iceland
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to go through Iceland by mountain bike. Unlike touring bikers, they want to explore the best single trails. They developed a plan to conquer the deep rivers, snow fields and sandy sections along the way.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #18: Swatch Nines – The Perfect Hip
programme.desc: When the morning mist clears over the Swiss Alps, the arena of snow and ice awakens. Directly below the Schilthorn, between the mountain ridges of Interlaken, huge masses of snow have been pressed into a beautiful, highly aesthetic Trannyland

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: New to the line-up this year, veteran Storm Show producer Darrell Miller has teamed up with Full Room Productions’ Ryan Halverson, bringing you more hard-hitting, action-packed, gnar-shredding from the Jackson Hole backcountry.

programme.title: King of the Court 2022 - Niterói, Rio de Janeiro (BRA)
programme.desc: Die dritte Station der King of the Court Crown Serie 2022 findet in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro, statt.

programme.title: Nedbank Desert Dash 2022 - Namibia (NAM)
programme.desc: The Desert Dash is more than an endurance mountain bike race, it's a wild beast that lures you and challenges you. It is a 393 km long, 24 hour battle between man and nature, body and spirit.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup 2022 - Taiba (BRA)
programme.desc: Die letzte Runde der Freestyle-Disziplin auf der Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour beginnt am Dienstag, 8. November. Beim Freestyle-Kite World Cup Taiba messen sich die besten Freestyle-Kiter der Welt bei perfekten Bedingungen auf der berüchtigten Lagune.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: LAAX Freestyle - Snowboard Halfpipe Special
programme.desc: The LAAX Open brings together the best professionals in the world with the next generation of riders - all competing in the same event. First-class snowboard competitions, powder runs, lifestyle, cultural and culinary delights - there is something for every taste.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #07: Motosurf World Championship Finals
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and to the Motosurf World Championship Finals from Macao, China, where the world’s top motosurfers battle for glory against a breathtaking backdrop of speed and precision. Who will conquer and claim the ultimate title?

programme.title: WOF 2025 #08: International Marathon Gorges de l’Ardèche
programme.desc: The Marathon International des Gorges de l'Ardèche is an annual canoe and kayak race in France. Participants navigate a 27-kilometre course through the breathtaking Ardèche Gorge.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintélyon
programme.desc: The Asics SaintéLyon is a legendary nocturnal ultramarathon in France that takes place on the route from Saint-Étienne to Lyon. The 2025 edition is scheduled for November 29 and 30 and promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #18: Swatch Nines – The Perfect Hip
programme.desc: When the morning mist clears over the Swiss Alps, the arena of snow and ice awakens. Directly below the Schilthorn, between the mountain ridges of Interlaken, huge masses of snow have been pressed into a beautiful, highly aesthetic Trannyland

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: New to the line-up this year, veteran Storm Show producer Darrell Miller has teamed up with Full Room Productions’ Ryan Halverson, bringing you more hard-hitting, action-packed, gnar-shredding from the Jackson Hole backcountry.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren zweiten Stopp in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt! Damit kehrt die FWT in das Freeride-Mekka der Pyrenäen zurück.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)
programme.desc: Der 3. Stopp der Freeride World Tour 2023 bringt uns nach Kanada zum Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro, (CAN).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #11: Epic Series – Season Preview
programme.desc: Today we take you on an exciting journey. Get ready for an exclusive preview of the Absa Cape Epic and the Epic Series 2025 - the ultimate test of endurance, skill and teamwork.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #12: Mediterranean Epic by Scott 2025
programme.desc: February 6-9, 2025, Oropesa del Mar (ESP): The Mediterranean Epic is a UCI 4-stage race where mountain bikers can enjoy mountain biking to the fullest on the course around Oropesa del Mar in the province of Castellón in Spain.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #13: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together some of the world's best backcountry athletes to showcase their skills.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #14: Pierra Menta 2025
programme.desc: The Pierra Menta is one of the toughest and most prestigious ski mountaineering races in the world. Held in the French Alps, it challenges teams of two over four days with steep ascents, technical descents, and over 10,000 meters of elevation gain.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: Searching for the Rivergod II
programme.desc: The documentary "Searching for the River God - The Journey continues" shows in fantastic images extreme kayaking on the most attractive and remote rivers in the world in Siberia, the jungles of Mexico and in Iceland.

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: Gordon Bennett Cup 2024 - Münster (GER)
programme.desc: The Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett, the FAI long-distance world championship for gas balloon pilots, is the oldest and most prestigious event in aviation and the ultimate challenge for pilots. Goal is to cover the greatest distance to the launch site without stopping

programme.title: Digital & Virtual Sport Special Gaming Docu
programme.desc: Restart the Game 2023 & ICF Open Virtual World Cup & World Rowing Indoor Championship

programme.title: King of the Court 2022 Finals – Doha (QAT)
programme.desc: King of the Court 2022 Finals - January 11th-14th, Doha (QAT. )Das zweite Jahr in Folge ist die Aspire Zone Gastgeber für die King of the Court Crown Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Teil des FWT-Finales findet in Fieberbrunn statt, wo die Athleten den imposanten Wildseeloder bezwingen müssen. Dieser Berg ist selbst für die erfahrensten Profis ein echter Härtetest und die Athleten werden sicherlich alles geben müssen.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2023 - Bangkok (THA)
programme.desc: Das etablierte innerstädtische Leichtathletikspektakel, die Golden Fly Series 2023, kehrte nach seinem ersten Auftritt in Phuket im Jahr 2021 nach Thailand zurück und fand in der Hauptstadt des Landes, Bangkok, statt.

programme.title: adidas Sickline - Extreme Kayak World Championship - The Documentary
programme.desc: This is the documentary about the history of the famous "Wellerbrücke" rapids, a famous section of the glacier-fed Ötztaler Ache river in Tyrol, and the adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship.

programme.title: Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering
programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: Canyoning 2008
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsports Team 2012: Canyoning - Unicycling - Slacklining
programme.desc: Modern outdoor sport has many facets. Today we follow the Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. We start in Ticino.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part I
programme.desc: "The Barrel" is a cinematic tribute to moments in big waves. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: Fond of Font
programme.desc: Seb Berthe and Hugo Parmentier have set themselves quite a challenge: to complete 100 7A boulders on a single day. An extraordinary journey of over 80 km, when you consider how demanding these rocks are. Crimps, falls, slips but above all a magnificent human adventure.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #15: Come Hell or High Water - Tibet extreme kayaking adventure
programme.desc: This week we are heading to the tibetian Hymalayans. Under the famous peaks and ridges, down in the deep valleya, lays the playground of some extreme sportsmen.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #16: GKA & GWA Season Start
programme.desc: Today we will have a look at the best Kitsurf and Wingfoil Women od the World, as they kicked off the 2025 season on the capverdian Islands.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #17: Motosurf World Games - Fujairah (UAE)
programme.desc: This year, MotoSurf came to Fujairah with an event of a special kind - the 2025 World Games Qualifier. The best MotoSurf athletes from around the world competed to select the 24 best male and female athletes in the sport.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: VANORA Engadinwind by DAKINE - Foiling
programme.desc: For almost two weeks, Lake Silvaplana in the beautiful Engadin will be the meeting point for the international windsurfing elite. With more than 300 participants from over 30 countries worldwide, the Engandinwind is the largest windsurf foil event of all time.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix
programme.desc: October 1st - 4th, 2020, In Lonato, Italy, the world's leading concentration camp gear kart racers will strive for glory and honor to win the ultimate award - the title of World Champion.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Gordon Bennett Cup 2024 - Münster (GER)
programme.desc: The Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett, the FAI long-distance world championship for gas balloon pilots, is the oldest and most prestigious event in aviation and the ultimate challenge for pilots. Goal is to cover the greatest distance to the launch site without stopping

programme.title: WOF 2025 #18: Swatch Nines – The Perfect Hip
programme.desc: When the morning mist clears over the Swiss Alps, the arena of snow and ice awakens. Directly below the Schilthorn, between the mountain ridges of Interlaken, huge masses of snow have been pressed into a beautiful, highly aesthetic Trannyland

programme.title: The Barrel - Part II
programme.desc: The Barrel is a cinematic tribute to those big-wave moments. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: The history of competitive Snowboarding
programme.desc: This Competition is in human nature. But that was far from the thoughts of early pioneers in the nineteen hundreds or those of Mister Sherman Poppin of Michigan. In the Christmas of 1965 he invented the Snurfer. This changed the history of snowsports.

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 1
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 2
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 3
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Jeremie Heitz
programme.desc: Freeriding: breathtaking pictures of an exceptional talent and an unique project!Athlete Profile Jérémié Heitz

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf World Tour Brazilian Special
programme.desc: The GKA Kitesurf World Tour 2024 will feature three spectacular stops in Brazil, highlighting the nation’s premier kitesurfing destinations. With top riders battling for championship titles, the 2024 season is set to deliver unforgettable action for fans worldwide.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship 2019 - Alahärmä (FIN)
programme.desc: The CIK-FIA presents the latest championships, bringing together the best drivers and the greatest hopes of motorsports of the future in races of incredible intensity. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over

programme.title: FIA Karting Championship 2019 - Lonato (ITA)
programme.desc: The CIK-FIA presents the latest championships, bringing together the best kart drivers and motorsport's brightest hopes of the future in races of incredible intensity.

programme.title: Silk Way Rally - Russland/Mongolei/China
programme.desc: The Silk Way Rally is a unique rally because everyone on the Silk Road is equal. Passion and enthusiasm unite people of different origins, nationalities, ethnicities and economic backgrounds.

programme.title: Monster Energy Supercross Geneva
programme.desc: The Monster Energy Supercross Geneva, a must-attend event at the end of the year, brings together several international riders on one of the largest indoor tracks in Europe. As a major sporting event in Switzerland, it has welcomed around 30,000 spectators in almost 35 editions.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #19: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt aufstrebende Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus aller Welt über 648 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Season Recap
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt!

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023
programme.desc: Die ITF Beach Tennis World Tour Sand Series Classics 2023 startet am 18. und 19. März mit ihrer ersten Station in Réunion (FRA). Beachtennis ist eine schnell wachsende Sportart und eine Kombination aus Tennis, Beachvolleyball und Badminton.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of WOMEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das wichtigste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen der Welt. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt durch 648 ungezähmte Kilometer unberührter Landschaften und 15 475 Höhenmeter.

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow
programme.desc: This April, Mayan Smith-Gobat and Ben Rueck joined China's renowned mountaineers Liu Yongbang (Abond) and Xiao Ting on an expedition to explore the Qingfeng Valley on the border of Zhangjiajie, China's first and largest national park.

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Nothing But Bangers Episode 2
programme.desc: 2 hours of nothing but great knockouts and exciting fights.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Glory 08: Tokyo was a kickboxing event held on May 3, 2013 at the Ariake Coliseum in Tokyo, Japan. This event featured a Glory 65kg Slam Tournament.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E64 K1 WGP Osaka Elimination 2005

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Leo McGee as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Gary Vig as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Peter Arbeau brings strong Muay Thai influences to his MMA matches. After travelling the world over constantly seeing out new training and competition experiences, Peter is more than re//ady for his next fight at HK37. This is an intense bout against an equally skilled Matt Krayco, with fists and legs flying.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Brandt Dewsberry came to MMA in an effort to learn to cope with his anger and selfishness. At HK34, in a match against Sergej Juskevic, he has to channel all of his new found skills to come out on top.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.desc: Chris Souster is an Attorney by day and a boxing coach by night. He sees the similarities between disputes in the courtroom and fighting in the ring. Today we get a perspective on what his coaching day looks like and the knowledge he shares with his MMA fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: CJ Hollett is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black Belt who loves teaching his craft. He is very well respected as an MMA coach for his technical mindset, high level skills and experience coaching UFC fighters. CJ loves working with MMA fighters because of their hunger to win, and believes it's time for Jiu Jitsu to make a resurgence in the MMA cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 Undercover Love S1 E184
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 Dholi Beats S1 E184
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 King of Hearts S1 E184
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 Second Chances S1 E184
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Jodha Akbar S2 E38
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 This is Fate S1 E184
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.sub-title: S01 : E184 The Good Son S1 E184
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.sub-title: S2002 : E11 RCA Dome - Indianapolis, IN - Racing
programme.desc: Rev the engine and drop the hammer - it's time for Monster Jam! The drivers head to RCA Dome in Indianapolis for racing fun!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2008 : E08 Alamodome - San Antonio, TX - Freestyle

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E08 Ford Field - Detroit, MI - Freestyle

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E10 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: The ground shakes as Monster Jam heads outdoors for freestyle! Tampa's Raymond James Stadium is on fire for the monster trucks this week.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E09 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Racing

programme.title: Monster Jam Primetime
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E02 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA
programme.desc: Monster Jam brings you all the racing, skills, and freestyle action from Stadium Championship Series East and West in 60-minute format program. With the world’s best drivers competing in the most famous Monster Jam Trucks for the series championship and an automatic bid to Monster Jam World Finals.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2016 : E01 World Finals XVII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing

programme.title: Arena Series in 30
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E02 Delta Center - Salt Lake City, UT
programme.desc: It's time for round 2 of Arena Championship Series West! Fan favorites Weston Anderson of Grave Digger and Brianna Mahon of Scooby-Doo hit the dirt alongside all your other favorite trucks and drivers!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2019 : E14 Broncos Stadium - Denver, CO
programme.desc: Monster trucks buck like wild horses in Broncos Stadium.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E02 World Finals XV - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing
programme.desc: Absolutely do not miss the racing action from Sam Boyd Stadium on March 21, 2014.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Funny Runs In The Family
programme.desc: AFV Family presents the funniest videos from its family of comedy brands AFV, What The Family, Peachy, and Kyoot. Episode 1

programme.title: S01 E01 - Funny Videos Now Countdown
programme.desc: Funny Videos Now Countdown does exactly that - we're counting down the funniest home videos from the America's Funniest Home Videos library. With hilarious themed countdown compilations and specialty compilations like "AFV Extreme" and "AFV's How To" - you'll be laughing all day! Hosted by Henry..

programme.title: S01 E01 - Funny Videos Power Hour
programme.desc: One hour of laughs - coming right up! Funny Videos Power Hour features 60 minutes of funny from the America's Funniest Home Videos library. Fails, Pranks, Pets, Kids, Babies, and more! Episode 1

programme.title: S01 E101 - Home Disaster Zone
programme.desc: Episode 101 - We know the biggest disasters happen under the roof, in the garage, and in the backyard too. So get ready for the funniest videos that showcase the biggest home disasters, see which one gets the Royal Disaster Badge Of Honor.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Love To Prank You Mom
programme.desc: Episode 1 - Moms are always the best to scare prank. Why? Because they fall for it every time and their loud reactions are the best. It's great that these moms are being good sports, but just remember they know how to prank back. Moms know best! Here are out funniest picks for mom pranks.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Madness - Fails Finals
programme.desc: Episode 1 - It's time to gear up March Madness! Madness Fail Finals is packed with hilarious backyard basketball blunders and court side campiness.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Prank Party
programme.desc: Prank Party is your destination for the funniest prank videos ever! You know you love watching people get startled, scared, and anything in-between! That's what Prank Party is all about - because it's all in good fun! From family pranks to Halloween pranks... pranking is our love language. Hosted..

programme.title: S01 E01 - Quotable Kids
programme.desc: You'll never guess what these funny kids are going to say next! Quotable Kids features the funniest kid sayings and home videos from the America's Funniest Home Videos library and they're going to make you laugh... a little TOO hard! Hosted by Angelina Spicer

programme.title: S01 E01 - The Best Pet Show Ever
programme.desc: Welcome to the funniest pet show anywhere in the WORLD! We know that's a bold claim, but it's true! We have gathered all of the funniest animal clips from the AFV library, and comedian host Matt O'Brien takes you on an adventure through the wonder world of pets!
